title: RSI Alert: Meredith Now Oversold - Nasdaq.com
text: The DividendRank formula at Dividend Channel ranks a coverage universe of thousands of dividend stocks , according to a proprietary formula designed to identify those stocks that combine two important characteristics - strong fundamentals and a valuation that looks inexpensive. Meredith Corp (Symbol: MDP) presently has an excellent rank, in the top 25% of the coverage universe, which suggests it is among the top most "interesting" ideas that merit further research by investors.
Click here to find out what 9 other oversold dividend stocks you need to know about »
